WorkItem.Description:
Hi,
 
I'm currently testing your geoutility library. During these test i came across a minor issue. 
 
When i do the conversion from UTM to MGRS and then back to UTM, it gave me the wrong coordinates.
 
Input UTM: 36 S 728350 3664450 => MGRS: 36S YB 2835 6445
Input MGRS: 36S YB 2835 6445 => UTM: 36 S 702835 3606445
 
As you can see it adds 2 extra 0 in UTM one after 36S7 the other after 36
 
It only does this when UTM ends on a 0. I also tested it with your test application. The results where the same.
 
Can you check this?
 
Thanks
Richard
 
BTW: Great Library ;-)
WorkItem.Summary: Conversion UTM to MGRS and back

Comments.Message:
Thanks for reporting.



** Closed by geoutility 01.12.2010 06:41
MGRS issue solved with change set 53398.
